@andrewharp @vrv The main reason for this quite messy implementation is:

  1. Some clean-up code is required for Camera ( specifically camera.addCallbackBuffer(bytes);), but not for Camera2.
  2. In DetectorActivity, the luminance plane is required. There is different code for the Camera and Camera2 API to extract the luminace plane from a YUV420 format. If we hide the difference between the API by giving just an RBGA buffer, it makes the luminance plane difficult to extract. In fact I don't really understand how DetectorActivity works so I hope someone else can help.
